explains: v. 使着魔（enchant 的过去式）

sentences.en: The lion was an enchanted prince.
sentences.cn: 狮子是一个被施了魔法的王子。

sentences.en: How fairy-like does everything appear to her enchanted vision!
sentences.cn: 在她那被施了魔法的幻象中，一切都显得多么像漂亮啊！

sentences.en: Dena was enchanted by the house.
sentences.cn: 蒂纳被这幢房子给迷住了.
